entry.dcterms:title: The social situation of the Roma in Hungary 1996. Aggregate file containing all voting districts.
entry.dcterms:creator: Nagy, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E89b: The social situation of the Roma in Hungary 1996. Aggregate file containing all voting districts.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12
entry.dcterms:creator: Kertesi, Gábor
entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Academy of Sciences Economic Sciences Research Center
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: the Roma make up 4-5 percent of the population, the survey examined their ethnic-based residential segregation, changing of tendencies over time and the social effects of the segregation; the aim was the identification of the segregated Gypsy zones and their characterization with the help of aggregated data in the 1990 census data
entry.dcterms:subject: social conditions and indicators
social stratification and groupings
minorities
social welfare policy and systems
censuses
equality and inequality
administrative area
aggregate data
cross-section
All the election districts of Hungary, except for the institutional or mainly institutional districts: a total of 83479 districts.
Summary of census data.
A
